title: The Bleatings Will Continue Until Morale Improves
sub_head: Lawmakers point fingers after the failure of Build Back Better.
body:
After failing to drive a multitrillion-dollar ideological agenda through a 50-50 Senate, progressives are now thoughtfully considering opposing views as they humbly attempt to fashion useful legislation in a new spirit of comity.
Just kidding. Leftist lawmakers in Congress have decided that their problem is that they have been too respectful of ideas advanced by less-radical colleagues. “Liberal lawmakers don’t want to talk about scaling back their ambitions to revive some of what Manchin killed,” says the headline today on a Washington Post story by Marianna Sotomayor.
